reviewText: I loved this movie from the first time I saw it actually I love them both so I was happy to buy the both A Grandpa for Christmas and The Christmas Card

The Christmas Card is one of my lifetime favorite Christmas movies, endearing in its simplicity, touching in its heartfelt warmth, one I can enjoy with my kids and grandkids.

A Grandpa for Christmas is also an excellent movie, which I got for my wife, also one to be watched and enjoyed with the kids and grandkids.

Great movies to have on hand for the holidays. These we just as advertised and were shipped and received very quickly. With the Hallmark Channel playing the same movies over and over, it pays to have these types of movies on hand. Ed Asner and Ernest Borgnine were great.
The Christmas Card is a cute movie. Support our troops!  Have not watched "Grandpa for Christmas" yet? 3 more words

I thought I would share that these movies come wrapped together, but with separate cases. I found it a pleasant surprise when they arrived.

I haven't watched A Grandpa for Christmas yet, but I enjoy The Christmas Card. It's a sweet story, and a good reminder of all our men and women serving overseas at Christmas time.

These 2 movies are great.  The christmas Card was very good.
Sending cards to our military is worth it at that time of
year.  Being away from home & family is hard on the men,
and getting a card from home, helps.
The other movie, A Grandpa for Christmas is just as good.
It's very special to a child to have a Grandpa for Christmas,
because you get so spoiled!!!  These 2 movies are very good.
I was dvring my Christmas movies and found that it was easier just to come on amazon and get the dvd for the Christmas movies I like
Fast shipping i love both these movies now I can watch them without commercials  :)
Movies arrived in perfect condition. Gave them to a friend for a birthday present and her said they worked perfectly.
Excellent.
Liked the purchase
daughter love the movie
Very heartwarming story.  Love this for the holiday.
no problems at all
These are 2 very good Christmas movies at one great price! We love Christmas movies all year around here and these are super!
good entertainment for the whole family
Two of my favorite Christmas movies on 1 disc.  The price was just right.  Made my Holiday this year and for years to come!

I saw A Grandpa For Christmas on cable and really liked it.  I ordered this so that I would be able to watch it whenever I wanted to.  The other movie is good too.  These movies are great Holiday fare and will surely become classics in time.
This is the kind of movie that really puts you in a great mood. It is fun and light hearted. I highly recommend.

Both of the movies are inspirational and reflect the true meaning of Christmas.  The Christmas Card was on our stations infrequently during the holiday but Grandpa for Christmas was never on.  This was a good deal.
Both stories were very good.  Had a good Christmas message.  Good for all ages & family.  I definitely would recommend this dvd.

Excellent holiday movies w/great soundtracks. Grandpa for Christmas puts u right into the holiday spirit.
Christmas Card is a cool scenario with great and is sometimes comical. Highly recommended.
I love these 2 movies. They are corny, but I really enjoy them. They arrived in the mail in excellent condition. I had no problems.
I really love these movies. They are both heart warming and  family friendly. I discontinued cable and now purchase my Hallmark movies!

We just love this movie! We lived in Wisconsin couple yrs & had to move back home to TX & we MISS the snow & WHITE Christmases!!! This movie helps ease the homesickness we feel for "up north" & let alone the story line & the cast of this movie are just great in & of themselves...a must see...its just "good stuff"!
it was great fast service and just as was stated in the ads and would buy more any time . Thanks
I have seen this many times and i love it. That is the reason I want to have a copy to keep. Wayne
These are great feel good movies.
An excellent comdo. !!!
great movie
My wife loved it.

If you ever want to see one of the best Christmas movies ever, A Grandpa for Christmas is it. Absolutely fantastic
great price for two movies.

My partner and I watch "A grandpa for Christmas" every year. It never fails to leave us feeling good even though we know what the ending is. It's just one of those movies that's worth watching time and time again, just like "Love Actually"
Great movie
